item.title: Go database/sql vs jmoiron/sqlx reading benchmark
item.description: Intro While building most of projects or apps it is very common to read from a database. In go standard way to do that is by using database/sql standard library. To illustrate how it can be done let's load from database a bunch of Points which are slice of Points defined as follows type Point struct { X int Y float64 } type Points []Point Next listening contains definition of function ReadPoints which for existing *sql.
